choiceSign.byEDS: Sign using the Electronic Digital Signature (EDS)
choiceSign.byMobEDS: Sign using the Mobile Electronic Digital Signature (MEDS)
choiceSign.notRegisteredOTP: You can not sign using a one-time password because your phone number is not specified. Please go the your personal account and specify it or contact the NJSC «Government for citizens» SC. To sign it in a different way please go back.
choiceSign.notRegisteredMobEDS: There is no EDS on the SIM-card. Please contact the NJSC «Government for citizens» SC for EDS obtaining. To sign it in a different way please go back.
